description: While Henri Matisse is perhaps best known as a painter, his work in other media—drawing, printmaking, and especially sculpture—was rooted in his earliest artistic experiences and training. His three-dimensional pieces reveal an interest in the human figure—the female nude, in particular—as well as ancient and Old Master works of art. With its sharply faceted limbs and monumental scale, Seated Nude suggests both vitality and repose.
title: Seated Nude
